channel.title: How to load a name from TextBox1.Text to a Label? [VB '08]
channel.description:
Hi, can someone please help me with this. I am trying to make a little application in VB '08, and so far it looks good, but one thing I really need to learn how to do. At the beginning, I made it so you enter your name for future purposes, like quests, and talking. But, how do I load the saved name into a Label? If you need further info. please just ask me here or on msn.
Msn - xx.mott.xx@live.com
Thanks
